headline: Boeing Stock Slides -- China Hits U.S. Defense Firms with Sanctions
summary: China's Sanctions Stir Geopolitical Risk; Defense Sector Stocks React

raw.headline: Boeing Stock Slides -- China Hits U.S. Defense Firms with Sanctions
raw.summary: China's Sanctions Stir Geopolitical Risk; Defense Sector Stocks React

headline: Boeing, Others Hit With China Sanctions. What It Means for the Stocks.
summary: Boeing was among the U.S. defense companies hit with sanctions by China on Friday in response to the Trump administration’s decision to sell weapons to Taiwan.  China said it would penalize 20 U.S. defense companies and 10 executives, The Wall Street Journal reported.  Boeing Northrop Grumman L3 Harris  Technologies, and Anduril Industries’ founder Palmer Luckey were among the targets.

raw.headline: Boeing, Others Hit With China Sanctions. What It Means for the Stocks.
raw.summary: Boeing was among the U.S. defense companies hit with sanctions by China on Friday in response to the Trump administration’s decision to sell weapons to Taiwan.  China said it would penalize 20 U.S. defense companies and 10 executives, The Wall Street Journal reported.  Boeing Northrop Grumman L3 Harris  Technologies, and Anduril Industries’ founder Palmer Luckey were among the targets.

headline: China Sanctions U.S. Defense Companies Northrop Grumman, Boeing, Anduril
summary: China sanctioned 20 U.S. defense contractors and 10 industry executives as retaliation for a $10 billion arms sale to Taiwan, including Anduril and founder Palmer Lucky.

raw.headline: China Sanctions U.S. Defense Companies Northrop Grumman, Boeing, Anduril
raw.summary: China sanctioned 20 U.S. defense contractors and 10 industry executives as retaliation for a $10 billion arms sale to Taiwan, including Anduril and founder Palmer Lucky.

headline: Aviation Capital Group Announces the Delivery of a Boeing 737 MAX 8 to LOT Polish Airlines
summary: NEWPORT BEACH, Calif., December 26, 2025--Aviation Capital Group LLC (ACG), a premier global full-service aircraft asset manager, announced today the delivery of a new Boeing 737 MAX 8 to LOT Polish Airlines, expanding ACG’s relationship with the airline.

raw.headline: Aviation Capital Group Announces the Delivery of a Boeing 737 MAX 8 to LOT Polish Airlines
raw.summary: NEWPORT BEACH, Calif., December 26, 2025--Aviation Capital Group LLC (ACG), a premier global full-service aircraft asset manager, announced today the delivery of a new Boeing 737 MAX 8 to LOT Polish Airlines, expanding ACG’s relationship with the airline.

headline: Airbus Wins Deal to Supply 18 C295 Transport Aircraft to Spain
summary: EADSY wins a deal to deliver 18 C295 transports to Spain, replacing older fleets and expanding the Air and Space Force's standardized operations.

headline: China sanctions Boeing after Trump approves $11bn arms sale to Taiwan
summary: China has hit Boeing with sanctions after Donald Trump approved an $11bn (£8.2bn) package of arms sales to Taiwan.

raw.headline: China sanctions Boeing after Trump approves $11bn arms sale to Taiwan

headline: BA vs. RTX: Which Aerospace-Defense Stock Is a Smarter Option?
summary: Both Boeing and RTX have big business segments built around military aircraft, defense systems and government contracts.

headline: China Sanctions Boeing, Other U.S. Companies Over Taiwan Arms Sale
summary: Beijing responded to the Trump administration’s approval of a large weapons package for Taipei with restrictions on firms and executives.
